property.name: Color Rendering Index Ra
property.description: This property represents the Color Rendering Index Ra value of the light output of a lamp or light fixture calculated in accordance with CIE standard CIE 13.3-1995 ”Method of Measuring and Specifying Color Rendering Properties of Light Sources”  \RefRef{cie1995}. The Ra value is the average of the color rendering indexes (indexes 1 through 8). This index value can be dependent on the operating conditions. The value reported by the property represents the Color Rendering Index at its present state.
